topic: Discover top 7 world's most powerful man-made magnets that reshape modern physics
summary: The hybrid magnet at the National High Magnetic Field Laboratory generates the world's strongest continuous magnetic field at 45.5 teslas. It achieves this by combining the advantages of superconducting coils with resistive magnet technology. This allows scientists to run experiments for long durations without interruption.
